name: 月の女、河の天使、神めくとき。
name_original: 月の女、河の天使、神めくとき。
description:
■Overview
"月の女、河の天使、神めくとき。"
An 18+ novel game set in modern Japan. The troubles of a sick and lonely woman,
It is recommended for those who want to take a peek at the divinity born after falling in love with a young man who understands for the first time in their lives.

■ story
"I will make you real"

Away from her sick father and her mother, who committed suicide to care for him,
A woman who lives alone on the outskirts of the city, relying on relatives and welfare assistance ---- Hidari Takanagi.
She aspires to be both an actor and a screenwriter, but because she wants a self-satisfied stage, no one finds her.
I was spending my days talking to another self in my brain.

Meanwhile, it was a series of bizarre murders that shook the world.
It mainly targeted elderly people and women living alone, and was thought to be the same criminal because of their cruel way of doing things.
News sites and SNS were busy with the topic every day.

One day, Hidari finds a young man sitting in a corner of the park on his way home from a convenience store late at night.
Despite his otherworldly beauty and friendliness, he quickly fell in love with Hidari, and Hidari also opened his heart to him.
The two become friends.

――The beautiful man never said a word to Hidari, but he was a serial killer.

In this work, there are expressions of violence in the text,
Visual representation of bloodshed, sexual intercourse between men and women,
Includes expressions such as the suicide of a relative of a character.
